item.title: Date, Date?, and the ToString Method in VB.Net
item.description:
I just spent the last 45 minutes frustrated as to why I was getting the following exception
“Input string was not in a correct format.” and “[InvalidCastException: Conversion from string “MMMM dd, yyyy” to type ‘Integer’ is not valid.] I kept thinking to myself, “How hard can this possibly be?!! I’ve done this a thousand times — Why is it wanting to convert my format string into an Integer?
